name: Vertical Slider using Marker: Background Change
description:
Creates a "vertical slider" with a marker and a paper. The paper acts like slider track and the marker acts like the thumb. The marker controls a Number component such that the value is at its minimum when the marker is at the bottom of the paper and max when the marker is at the top.

This template creates a background which is black when the Number component is at its minimum and white when the Number component is at its maximum. It also creates a sound whose playback rate is mapped to the value (divided by 100).
keyWords: slider, marker, background, sound, playback rate
